attributes.review: do not get this app! it is the worst. it took forever to download and when i opened it i was so offended by the choice of the photo that was shown. ALSO it asked me for my phone number so i could be able to see what was going on with the campaign. i think to be able to see what’s going on i shouldn’t have to give my number to create an account. ✨trash app✨
attributes.title: awful app

attributes.review: as soon as i opened the app, i saw a soggy cheeto with weird hair on it and now everything is tinted the color orange. it was so bad i actually fell down the stairs because i couldn’t see properly. i downloaded this app to support our wonderful, racist, sexist, misogynistic, homophobic, xenophobic, transphobic, rapist, bigot of a president. then i realized why would i do that? all presidents matter!! i have to go, i’m campaigning for biden 🥰✨🙈🧚‍♂️💕#BIDEN 2020 #BLM
attributes.title: i could have died 😱 *emotional*

attributes.review: I got this app to support my president. Ever since I downloaded it I’ve been seeing an orange man with what looks like a poorly made blonde/orange wig late at night. As the days progressed, the man kept whispering things like “CHina” and “fake news”. I’ve tried to get away from this man, but he somehow pops up on my Twitter and Facebook. Even though I deleted the app, I still feel his presence in my home. Be careful!! Don’t get this app!!
attributes.title: Disturbed

attributes.review: this app made me almost die!!! i opened it and saw the scariest MOST ugly thing i’ve ever seen!! it looked like a cheeto and was very large! i was making “settle for biden” cookies on the statue of liberty 🗽 and was so shocked by this disgusting sight that i burnt my hand off and fell off lady liberty and landed on another racist guy! it was kanye!! i’m in the hospital now with PTSD and having hallucinations over the horrible image i saw on this app!! please never download😖😖😖never❤️✨
attributes.title: SCARY DON’T DOWNLOAD😾😾

attributes.review: this app is so disgusting it hurts my eyes. This man is so problematic and is doing damage to America. He only thinks about himself and doesn’t care to throw people out. He treats everyone who are not white like garbage and it’s ✨DISGUSTING ✨ uneducated people are voting for this man and they need to open up their eyes and SEE how much of a problem the “president” is. I ask the man in the White House to leave ❤️😹. #bunkerboy #bigbaby #cheetodustfaceman #anyoneelsefor2020
attributes.title: USELESS!! it’s a no❤️ from me

attributes.review: I was so excited to get this amazing ✨orange✨filled app to see what he would be doing as president but once i downloaded it, it wouldn’t load. i’ve been trying this for a week and it’s stuck. I was so excited for nothing😔 i’m really disappointed now and will tell everyone about this experience. i👁 am👤 really😫 freaking🤬 sad🥺 now⬇️ bye👋 guys👨‍🦱 dont❌ forget🤷🏼‍♀️ dont❌ vote🗳 trump🍊
attributes.title: ✨Doesn’t work✨.                      tiktok😼✨

attributes.review: I first got this app to see what this awful candidate was doing with his sad and miserable life. But then a few days after I was scrolling through the app and the big orange man launched out of my phone and started strangling me. He called me a blind wizard and punched me right in the nose. He then proceeded to call me Helen Keller because of my disabilities 👩🏽‍🦯. Please do not get this app unless you want to be physically attacked by the big man named Trumpy wumpy.
attributes.title: Awful app ❤️

attributes.review: So I wanted to expand my political views, and this app popped up first thing. I can’t believe I ignored the low rating! It stops any music from playing while using it, and it keeps saying I don’t have internet when I do?!!! Also, it won’t let me do anything until I let it use my location (at all times) and let it give me notifications! Trump really outdid himself this time, huh 🤦🏼‍♂️
attributes.title: Messed me up BAD 😔

attributes.review: so i decided to download this app because i wanted to see what my favorite president was planning to do after he wins the election 🇺🇸TRUMP 2020🇺🇸but then i remembered that trump is actually a racist, sexist, homophobic, transphobic, anti-semitic piece of doo-doo 💩💩(i know, big shocker 😱😱) and i realized that trump is actually secretly satan in a really terrible pig costume🐷🐷and so then he realized that i figured it out and before i could tell anyone he pushed me off a cliff🙈rip to me👻👻
attributes.title: I DIED BECAUSE OF THIS APP👻😤😤

attributes.review: I was so, so excited to download this app to support president cheeto puff 🤩🍊😻🥰  but i was very, VERY shocked and disgusted to learn that this app spreads negativity and hate 😿🤡.  The app keeps spamming me with messages that are hurtful 🤬🤯🙀 and mean 😵😪🧚🏻‍♀️. I am so disappointed and it sure would be a shame if this app were removed from the app store 🙀🧐😰, but sadly i think it is what must be done😢🦧. I love president orange😃🥳🥰🥵😜 but this app must be taken down 💩😩😡👺😾!! ✨trump 2020✨
attributes.title: This app is ✨𝒶𝓌𝒻𝓊𝓁✨
